snippet: A wide range of wines can work to complement a mellow tomato crostata, though cool reds fare best.
abstract: Cooked tomato dishes pair well with high-acid barbera wines or many other reds and roses.
lead_paragraph: A wide range of wines can work to complement a mellow tomato crostata, though cool reds fare best.

headline.main: With Cooked Tomatoes, Stick With Cool Reds or Rosé
